title: How to Create a Finsta Account for Instagram: Quick Tutorial

steps.title: Click the profile tab in the Instagram app.
steps.content: Click the profile tab in the Instagram app. It's the person icon in the bottom right of the app. This takes you to your account page.

steps.title: Tap the ≡ button.
steps.content: Tap the ≡ button. It's in the top-right of the profile page. This opens a new menu with additional account options.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's near the top of the additional account options menu.

steps.title: Tap Add Account then Create new account.
steps.content: Tap Add Account then Create new account . It's near the bottom of the settings menu. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Enter a username and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter a username and tap Next . Make sure your username doesn't identify you if you want to keep your finsta secret!

steps.title: Enter a password and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter a password and tap Next . You can always change your password later if needed. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Skip on the "Find Facebook Friends" page.
steps.content: Tap Skip on the "Find Facebook Friends" page. Since your finsta is for a smaller group of people, it will be easier to add friends manually instead.

steps.title: Tap Next on the contact sync page, then Don't Allow.
steps.content: Tap Next on the contact sync page, then Don't Allow . This will prevent other users in your contacts from following you.

steps.title: Add a profile photo and click Next.
steps.content: Add a profile photo and click Next . You can skip this step or put an image that hides your identity (like a meme or animal).

steps.title: Set your finsta to private.
steps.content: Set your finsta to private. This will mean only people you approve can follow you and see your content. To do so: Tap the profile button in the bottom-right of the app. Tap ≡ then Settings . Tap Privacy and Security . Tap the checkbox next to Private Account under "Account Privacy." After this, you're done! You now have a new finsta account. You're ready to follow some friends or become Instagram famous .

steps.title: It's a great way to share more casual content with a smaller group of friends.
steps.content: It's a great way to share more casual content with a smaller group of friends. Plus, you can post things that you wouldn't want your larger social circle to see. It's not a guaranteed way to hide your content, but it's much less likely to be seen, especially if you don't use your real name. [4] X Research source
